summary: Two garbage men uncover a conspiracy involving illegal toxic waste dumping and decide to bring the whole operation down.
cast: Charlie Sheen|Emilio Estevez|Leslie Hope|Keith David|Dean Cameron|John Getz|Hawk Wolinski|John Lavachielli|Geoffrey Blake|Cameron Dye|John Putch|Tommy Hinkley|Darrell Larson|Sy Richardson|Kari Whitman|Troy Evans|Brad Wyman|Matt Robinson|Bob Brown|Erik Stabenau|Bobby Burns|Eddie Braun|James 'Poorman' Trenton|Jennifer Badham|Carol King|Cathy Cavadini|David McCharen|David Randolph|Greg Finley|Bryan Scott|Deborah Fallender|Yan Birch|Bojesse Christopher|George Coutoupis|Christina Eliason|Fred Moon
keywords: 55 gallon drum of haardous waste|illegal toxic waste dumping|sleeping on a beach|telescopic rifle|shooting a campaign poster
title: Dos chalados y un fiambre
